name: Wisp (LeonThorn)
description:
Platformer inspired by Ori Series.

In this world, you are born different than most. You are at a disadvantage compared to most and cannot jump. 

When your friends take a shortcut you will have to take the longer, jump free route. 

This is just the beginning of this short adventure and exploration into the idea of being disadvantaged in society. Something I face as a disabled person is having to take the longer routes due to inaccessability or not go anywhere at all. I feel like Wisp allows me to explore those frusturations in a kind hearted way.

Art style follows monochrome style, heavily influenced by the Limbo platformer.
